name: Silent Mansion: Summoner Part2
description:
Silent Mansion is a mystery place with a beautiful atmosphere.

You will find clues in this historic mansion and chase a witch.

In this place where fear and beauty coexist, you can solve puzzles and experience action.

The experience of high quality graphics will give you the illusion that you are there!

And There is an event stage that is able to enter after you clear all stages.

At the event stage, you have to fight against a more powerful witch!
